name: National Accountability (Second Amendment) Ordinance, 2006
tagline: "To further amend the National Accountability Ordinance, 1999."

WHEREAS it is expedient further t' amend the National Accountability
Ordinance, 1999 (XVItr of 1999), for the purposes hereinafter appearing;
WHEREAS the National Assembly is not in session and circumstance exit
which render it necessary to take immediate action;EXTRAORDINARY
PUBLISHEO BY AUTHORITY

PART I
Acts, Ordinances, President,s Orders and Regulations

lslamabad, the 3rd Augttst, 2006
F. No. 2 (l )/2006-Pub.-The following Ordinance promulgated by the
President is hereby published for General information :-
' Ororrarce No. XIX or 2006
AN
ORDINANCE
further to amend the National Accountability Ordinance, 1999
(623)
Price : Rs. 2.00 13191 (2006)lBx. Gaz.)I
624 THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., AUG. 3, 2006 IPARTI
Now, THEREFoRE, in exercise of the powers conferred by clause (1) of
Article 89 ofthe Constitution ofthe Islamic Republic ofPakistan, the President is
pleased to make and promulgate the following Ordinance:-
1. Short title ard eommencemetrt-{1) This Ordinance may be
called the National Accountability (Second Amendment) Ordinance, 2006.
(2) It shall come into force at once.
2. Amendment of Section 7, Ordinance XVIII of 1999.-In the
National Accountability Ordinance, 1999 (XVItr of 1999), in section 7, in
sub-section (a), for the words "a Deputy Chairman" the words "two Deputy ^
Chairmen" and for the word "Chairman", occurring for the third time, the word
"Chairmen" shall respectively be substituted and shall be deemed to have been
so substituted on the l6th November, 2005.
Grrenel
PERVEZ MUSHARRAI],

2006 (VI of 2006), is hereby repealed.
